name: @guillaumeferber/ui-kit
description: UIKit is a lightweight and flexible CSS front-end framework based on ITCSS architecture and built with Sass

scripts.copy:config: git add -A && git commit && git push && cp package_dist.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/ && cp .npmrc dist/ && npm run refreshVSToken
scripts.version:patch: cd dist/ && npm version patch && npm publish . --access=public
scripts.postpublish: cp dist/package.json package_dist.json && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:publish: npm run cleanup && gulp deploy && npm run copy:config && npm run version:patch && npm run postpublish
scripts.push: gulp build && npm run commit && git push

author: Guillaume Ferber
